name: Iron Sky
description:
Iron Sky is an arcade game developed by Reality Twist. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Reality Twist.
You can play Iron Sky on iOS and Android.
Cathy Overett, James Wenban, Mark Overett and Matt Pohl produced the game. Timo Vuorensola directed the game. Ben Watkins and Laibach scored the game.
